question.ask: 2. I am so sorry. I just knocked over your coffee.

std.value: It is not a big deal.
std.ai: It is not a big deal.

question.keywords: That’s all right|It doesn’t matter|That’s OK|It is not a big deal|Never mind|Not at all

question.ask: 3. May I speak to Mr. White, the director of the department, please?

std.value: I’m sorry, but he’s having a meeting.
std.ai: I’m sorry, but he’s having a meeting.

std.value: Sorry, he is not available now.
std.ai: Sorry, he is not available now.

std.value: Sure. May I ask who is calling, please?
std.ai: Sure. May I ask who is calling, please?

std.value: Sorry, he’s not in right now. Can I take a message?
std.ai: Sorry, he’s not in right now. Can I take a message?

std.value: Sorry, he’s out at the moment.
std.ai: Sorry, he’s out at the moment.

question.keywords: Hold on|sorry having meeting|Sorry not available|Sure|Sorry not in|Sorry out

question.ask: 4. The beef you cooked is really tender and tasty.

std.value: Thank you. I am glad you like it.
std.ai: Thank you. I am glad you like it.

std.value: Thanks. Would you like to have some more?
